metadata.Title: CVE-2023-47100 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: In Perl before 5.38.2, S_parse_uniprop_string in regcomp.c can write tounallocated space because a property name associated with a \p{...} regularexpression construct is mishandled. The earliest affected version is5.30.0.

criterions.comment: perl package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
